Package entity

Class Lesson

java.lang.Object
entity.Lesson
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Entity Class Lesson that stores details about a lesson's timings
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Lesson

      public Lesson​(int day, java.lang.String venue, java.lang.String lessonType, java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.LocalTime endTime)
      This is the constructor for objects of class Lesson
      Parameters:
      day - Day of the Week when the lesson is being held
      venue - venue is the venue where the lesson is being held
      lessonType - lessonType describes whether the lesson is a tutorial, lecture, seminar etc.
      startTime - startTime starting time of lesson
      endTime - endTime ending time of lesson

    • Lesson

      public Lesson​(int day, java.lang.String venue, java.lang.String lessonType, java.lang.String labWeek, java.time.LocalTime startTime, java.time.LocalTime endTime)
      This is the constructor for objects of class Lesson
      Parameters:
      day - Day of the Week when the lesson is being held
      venue - venue is the venue where the lesson is being held
      lessonType - lessonType describes whether the lesson is a tutorial, lecture, seminar etc.
      labWeek - labWeek specifies whether labs are held in the even week or odd week or both
      startTime - startTime starting time of lesson
      endTime - endTime ending time of lesson

    • checkCLash

      public boolean checkCLash​(Lesson lesson)

      Returns:
      returns a boolean value that determines if the lessons clash
